nodes.subtitle: I Exist ‚Äî Axiom 0

Formalized as the identity quaternion [1,0,0,0], where the scalar "1" represents pure existence and the vector components (0,0,0) represent experiential content (initially empty).

This is not a static entity but an ongoing process ‚Äî "I am-ing." The experiencing of existence is continuous activity, not a fixed point.

üü¢ Published: Vanhorn (2025), DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.17785676

The disclosure map documents WHAT is happening in the world. This node asks: WHO is observing it? The pure observer [1,0,0,0] is the witness function ‚Äî the awareness through which all documented patterns are perceived.

nodes.label: I HAVE

Operational: The transition from pure awareness to embodied awareness. I have distinctions ‚Üí I have sensations ‚Üí I have a body. Distinctions come FIRST.
